Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-6491 affecting package php for versions less than 8.3.23-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-6491 affecting package php for versions less than 8.3.23-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package php is earlier than 8.3.23-1, affected by CVE-2025-6491
